descriptionHtml:
[color=red][size=4][b][center]Requirements:[/center][/b][/size][/color]
[size=3][center]Skyrim V.1.9.32.0
Dawnguard
Hearthfire 
Dragonborn[/center][/size]

[size=4][center][color=cyan]Description:[/color][/center][/size]
[center]The game is saved after having gone through the tutorial introductions in the beginning. It starts right after leaving the Helgen Keep cave to Skyrim.


[/center][size=4][center][color=cyan]Character Status:[/color][/center][/size]
[center]Level: 1
    Race: Nord


[color=cyan][size=4]Change your race:

[/size][/color][/center][center][/center][center]Do you want to change your gender/race/look? If so, it's simple.        
                             Open your console by pressing the 'tilde key' beside the number 1 button on the keyboard.[/center][color=#ff0000]                                                                                                [img]http://i67.tinypic.com/jpzuc3.jpg[/img][/color]
[center][color=#ff0000]                   [/color][size=2]After having pressed on the button. The console will appear like the image below.[/size][/center][size=2]
                                                                                                [img]http://i65.tinypic.com/2drxlbs.jpg[/img]
 [center]                       Like the image. Type: showracemenu and you will be able to change your character.[/center]
[/size]

[color=cyan][size=4][center]Manual Installation:[/center][/size][/color]
[center]1. Extract the *.rar file to any location on your computer.
 2. Open the folder that was extracted.                            
 3. Right click the *.ess file, then click copy.                     
                                                4. Go to C: Drive \ Users \ "Your Computer Name" \ Documents \ My Games \ Skyrim \ Saves
 5. In the saves folder. Right click and paste.                     
                                   6. You will see the *.ess file you copied previously showing up in the saves folder.
 7. Done, enjoy the game.                                                [/center]
author: GamerUK01
